content.question: Let <math alttext="f" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>f</mi></mrow></mstyle></math> be the function with derivative given by <math alttext="f prime of x, equals, sine x plus the cosine of, open parenthesis 2 x, close parenthesis, minus the fraction pi over 4 " display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><msup><mrow><mi>f</mi></mrow><mrow><mo>′</mo></mrow></msup><mrow><mo>(</mo><mi>x</mi><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo>=</mo><mi>sin</mi><mo>⁡</mo><mi>x</mi><mo>+</mo><mi>cos</mi><mo>⁡</mo><mrow><mo>(</mo><mn>2</mn><mi>x</mi><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo>−</mo><mfrac><mrow><mi>π</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>4</mn></mrow></mfrac></mrow></mstyle></math> for <math alttext="0 less than or equal to x, less than or equal to pi " display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mn>0</mn><mo>≤</mo><mi>x</mi><mo>≤</mo><mi>π</mi></mrow></mstyle></math>. On which of the following intervals is <math alttext="f" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>f</mi></mrow></mstyle></math> increasing?

choices.label: <math alttext="open bracket, 0 comma 0.724, close bracket " display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mo>[</mo><mrow><mrow><mn>0</mn></mrow><mo>,</mo><mn>0.724</mn></mrow><mo>]</mo></mrow></mstyle></math> only

<math alttext="open bracket, 0 comma 0.724, close bracket " display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mo>[</mo><mrow><mrow><mn>0</mn></mrow><mo>,</mo><mn>0.724</mn></mrow><mo>]</mo></mrow></mstyle></math> and <math alttext="open bracket, 2.418 comma 3.142, close bracket" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mrow><mo>[</mo><mn>2.418</mn><mo>,</mo><mn>3.142</mn><mo>]</mo></mrow></mrow></mstyle></math>

<math alttext="open bracket, 0 comma 0.253, close bracket " display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mrow><mo>[</mo><mn>0</mn><mo>,</mo><mn>0.253</mn><mo>]</mo></mrow></mrow></mstyle></math> and <math alttext="open bracket, 1.571 comma 2.889, close bracket" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mrow><mo>[</mo><mn>1.571</mn><mo>,</mo><mn>2.889</mn><mo>]</mo></mrow></mrow></mstyle></math>
<math alttext="open bracket, 0.724 comma 2.418, close bracket" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mo>[</mo><mn>0.724</mn><mo>,</mo><mn>2.418</mn><mo>]</mo></mrow></mstyle></math>

content.answer: <math alttext="open bracket, 0 comma 0.724, close bracket " display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mo>[</mo><mrow><mrow><mn>0</mn></mrow><mo>,</mo><mn>0.724</mn></mrow><mo>]</mo></mrow></mstyle></math> and <math alttext="open bracket, 2.418 comma 3.142, close bracket" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mrow><mo>[</mo><mn>2.418</mn><mo>,</mo><mn>3.142</mn><mo>]</mo></mrow></mrow></mstyle></math>

topic.text: 5.3: Determining Intervals on Which a Function Is Increasing or Decreasing

skill.text: Skill 2.E: Describe the relationships among different representations of functions and their derivatives.
